item.title: Jill Biden's ex-husband charged with murdering his wife
item.description: A grand jury indicted William Stevenson, 77, with first-degree murder in connection with the death of his wife.

item.title: House passes funding package to end partial government shutdown
item.description: The House held votes on Tuesday to reopen the government after it partially shut down over the weekend.
